actionButtons.description: Call to Action plugin that allow you to show buttons on the player.

displayOnRelated.doc: Show the plugin with related screen

openInNewWindow.doc: Links should open in new screen

displayTime.doc: When to display the cta screen. "end" will display at the video end, or you can set time in seconds

displayTimeMetadataField.doc: The metadata field name from your custom schema for display time

titleMetadataField.doc: The metadata field name from your custom schema for the title

actions.doc:
List of Actions that used to draw the buttons:

  • label The default text label that appears on the button. It is recommended to keep this short. Note that depending on font and font size, long labels may be displayed inappropriately.
  • url The URL to which the button leads.
  • metadataField The metadata field that the URL to which the button leads is taken from. If this is kept empty, or the metadata field is empty, the default URL will be used.

initvalue.fontFamily: Arial, Roboto, Arial Unicode Ms, Helvetica, Verdana, PT Sans Caption, sans-serif

actionForm.description: Call to Action - Data collection form

displayOn.doc: When to show the screen. Can be either: "start", "end", <time> or <percent%>

submitRequired.doc: Does the user must submit the form to view the video

template.doc: HTML Template for the info screen.
